TFEParser v1.0
-------------

A small and simple expression interpreter.
It's primary purpose is to implement Filtered feature in a custom DataSet.

Contact Information:
--------------------
Roman D. Pulov
Zaporizhzhe
Ukraine

In case of come problems or proposals contact me :
romanpulov@yahoo.com

Documentation:
--------------
See the attached example (in Delphi 6) but it's expected to work with
any Delphi version.
Also see HELP\ directory. The documentation was created with
Doc-O-Matic(c) tool.
